chapter.title: Majisti\View
chapter.para:
The View class is basically the same as a Zend_View class except that it adds two more behaviours.
It proxies the translate function from a translator with the 'underscore' function. That way, a controller can do $this->view->_('messageToTranslate') or a view can do the same with $this->_('messageToTranslate').
It support multiple script directories working in concordance with the Multiple Dispatcher.
